name: design-comuni-wordpress-theme-last-core
description: Tema Wordpress dei Comuni Italiani - branch autonomo

scripts.build: ./copy_assets.sh && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.build:caraffa: ./copy_assets.sh && ./caraffa_style.sh && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.version: node scripts/config-sync && git add style.css && git add README.md
scripts.postversion: echo "You can now publish your tag with 'git push --follow-tags'"

author: Presidenza del Consiglio dei Ministri
